additionalTargetingAverageBudget.tooltip: Couples tend to spend 1/3 of their wedding budget on venue. e.g. $5K on the venue = $15K overall budget.
additionalTargetingInformation: This information will not be displayed on your profile, but will be used to match you with the most relevant couples, increasing your potential conversion rate.
additionalTargetingLowestBudget.tooltip: Bridebook will promote your venue to relevant couples that are a good budget match.
deleteBrochureWarning.body: You won't be able to recover it.
dragDropDocument: Click here to drag and drop your document
fileFormatWeddingBrochurePricelists: File format: PDF only | Maximum file size: {{filesize}}
indicateStartingPrice: Please indicate the starting price for your services.
inHouseCateringRange: If you charge a Venue Rental Fee, and <1>also</1> charge for <4>In-house Catering</4> on a <6>Price per head</6> basis (e.g. $48 per head for catering only), please add your price range for in-house catering:
inputText.additionalTargetingAverageBudg: What is the <1>AVERAGE TOTAL</1> wedding budget (venue & all else) of couples who host their wedding at your venue?
inputText.additionalTargetingLowestBudge: What is the <1>LOWEST TOTAL</1> wedding budget (venue & all else) couples need to host their wedding at your venue?

inputText.packagePricePerHeadTo.label: Price per head to

inputText.venueHireRangeTo.label: Venue rental fee to
packagePricePerHead: Wedding Package Pricing: Price Per Head
packagePricePerHeadFrom.tooltip: This should represent your off season / off peak prices, e.g. a Tuesday in February
packagePricePerHeadRange: If you offer <1>Wedding Packages</1> on a <3>Price per head</3> basis (e.g. $50 per head, inclusive of venue rental, catering and additional items), please add your price range:
packagePricePerHeadTo.tooltip: This should represent your peak season prices, e.g. a Saturday in August
packageTotalInclusivePriceRange: If you offer <1>Wedding Packages</1> on a <3>Total Price</3> basis (e.g. $8,000 total, inclusive of venue rental, catering and additional items), please add your price range:
pricing.tellCoupleMore: Tell couples more about you pricing and what's included
topTip.description: Please complete all the pricing options that apply to your venue below. If a section does not apply, please leave it blank.
topTip.title: Pricing is the most important factor for couples when deciding their wedding venue.
totalInclusivePriceFrom.tooltip: This should represent your off season / off peak prices, e.g. a Tuesday in February
totalInclusivePriceTo.tooltip: This should represent your peak season prices, e.g. a Saturday in August
uploadWeddingBrochurePricelists: Upload your wedding brochure and pricing information. We will share these with couples <2>instantly when they request them</2> and will then <5>share the couple's contact details and requirements with you</5> to follow up.
